text: hi my name is yes Aaron again and today

connect solution can be integrated into

to Bob but unfortunately he wasn't very
much help
I checked your competitors website and

to renew the promotional pricing

punctuation
in addition the AI powered solution

in real time to assist spanish-speaking

the eye capabilities provided keyword

simply an example depending on the

relevant knowledge-based URL screen pops

based on these AI powered insights
solution capabilities extend beyond just
keyword or keyphrase detection and also

persons places quantities dates and

a feature of the solution in this
example we have a visual emoji sentiment

for the entire detected text all of this
information and insights are great for

solution even more powerful however is
that all of this data can be attached to
the Amazon Connect contact trace record
giving you centralized source of truth
for context center call details as well
as the AI powered speech analytics data
Amazon Connect contact trace records are
records of all the contact details for

Connect portal you can see that I can
